basics.title: Basics
basics.desc: Start by entering the basic details of your event

timeline.title: Timeline
timeline.desc: Set the event schedule, sales start time, and performance order.

lineup.title: Lineup
lineup.desc: Set the schedule and performance order for your event, from start to finish.

image.title: Image
image.desc: Upload an image for your event.

tickets.title: Tickets
tickets.desc: Create ticket types, set prices, and limit the number of tickets each person can purchase.

settings.title: Settings
settings.desc: Assign contact details and grant reporting access.

title: Title
scheduleTheStartTime: Schedule the start times for each artist performing at the event
areYouSureToDeleteArtist: Are you sure you want to delete this artist?
